String.string: You received a message from Elleon, who was on the hunt for Akasha's trail. Go to Firebase Valor at Fyrmount and speak with Elleon. (You can use the {@LinkCreature:61#1009#teleportal} in the town to travel to Firebase Valor.)

Find the cave southeast of Firebase Valor, and use the {@LinkCreature:204#1501#teleportal}. Speak with Elleon. [You must select Akasha's Hideout (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:204#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Eliminate Garion to open the first gate.
Eliminate Adanok to open the second gate.
Eliminate Nadaim, Guardian of Epidemics, to open the third gate.
Defeat {@linkcreature:3006#5002#Karascha} and use the strange seal. (Summons Gilgash's Pylon or Akakalash's Pylon.)
Investigate the Plagueheart. [Eliminate Lugribar or Shargrim to summon the Plagueheart.]
